function.name: func_gammq
function.doc: func_gammq function calculates the complement of the incomplete gamma function.

argument.name: a
argument.doc: is a scalar containing the value of the exponential of the gamma function.

argument.name: x
argument.doc: is a scalar containing the upper limit of the integral of the incomplete gamma function.

function.name: func_qsimp
function.doc: func_qsimp function performs a numerical integration of a function func over a closed interval [a,b] using the Simpson's rule.

return.doc: the integral of the function func from a to b.

argument.name: d
argument.doc: is the type of distribution to be considered.

argument.name: a
argument.doc: is the lower closed interval boundary.

argument.name: b
argument.doc: is the upper closed interval boundary.
